title: iPhone deal alert: buy the iPhone 11 Pro, get another for free from Verizon
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Save on the iPhone 11 Pro at Verizon's 4-day flash sale
article: If you're looking to score a deal on the mighty iPhone 11 Pro, then you're in luck. Starting today through Sunday, Verizon is offering up to $1,000 in savings on the iPhone 11 Pro when you buy another phone and add a new line. To receive this iPhone deal, you must add both smartphones to your cart with monthly device payments and add one phone with a new line to any Unlimited Verizon plan. You'll then see the $1,000 credited to your account over the next 24 to 30 months. This is a fantastic deal for a family looking to switch to Verizon and save on the powerful iPhone 11 Pro. Verizon's 4-day flash sale and ends on Sunday at Midnight, so you should take advantage of this epic deal now before it's too late.
